The Naughticorns have played it so much that the battery is running out. The Naughticorns have been taking the music player all around Toyland, desperately trying to fix or hide. programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today’s world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.title: Global Watch

programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. programme.title: Zoom in
programme.desc: A TV news magazine show packed with top stories from around the world. The weekly program zooms in on the details of trending news items and zooms out to give viewers the bigger picture. With in-depth analysis and current perspective, Zoom in takes you on a journey beyond the daily headlines.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Naughticorns have borrowed Noddy's music player to practise a special dance for Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party. But when Noddy arrives at the party, the other toys are all scared by a strange noise. Noddy decides to investigate: what's making the scary noise? Using his investigating skills and following all the clues, Noddy arrives at the Naughticorn Stables where he realises that the scary noise is actually a slowed down tune on the music player. The Naughticorns have played it so much that the battery is running out. The Naughticorns have been taking the music player all around Toyland, desperately trying to fix or hide. Noddy reassures them it's not broken, it just needs new batteries in. The Naughticorns say sorry for scaring everyone and Pat-Pat's Pumpkin Party can at last get under way. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: While an incredible new discovery is made in the triangle-shaped swamp, Rick Lagina and members of the team make shocking connections in Italy between the Knights Templar and the Oak Island mystery.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Callie North (Season 3), Amos Rodriguez (Season 7), and Lucas Miller (Season 1) are challenged by Joel van der Loon (Season 7) to create two projectiles capable of taking down large game.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: What would you do if you were stranded in the wilderness with what was in your pockets? Joel van der Loon (Season 7), Clay Hayes (Season 8 winner), and Lucas Miller (Season 1) find out with this challenge.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Darrel Miklos is embarking on a mission to solve one of the most intriguing mysteries in history: the disappearance of the Nazi's looted WWII treasure, estimated to be worth billions.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: As the team begins drilling in search of a metal object buried in the Mesa, they also perform a new experiment at the Triangle that causes startling UFOs to appear on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Anna takes aim at swamp monsters with her bow and arrow. Pickle surprises Troy with her secret weapon. Little Willie breaks news to his dad that transforms their season.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: It's just another Riverside auction, until Barry and Kenny show up in their alternative fuel vehicle. Lisa does her best to break the curse of the bad locker and Ivy finds some curious denominations.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: In West Covina, Lisa is so busy looking back that she makes the worst auction mistake. Rene finds a bargain and makes the most of it. Ivy unfolds his way to a profit and unloads some stuff onto Lisa.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Callie North (Season 3), Amos Rodriguez (Season 7), and Lucas Miller (Season 1) are challenged by Joel van der Loon (Season 7) to create two projectiles capable of taking down large game.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: As the team begins drilling in search of a metal object buried in the Mesa, they also perform a new experiment at the Triangle that causes startling UFOs to appear on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the world's top ten mysterious devices, from strange, grooved discs found in a cave in China to an ancient Greek computer to an incredible crystal skull unearthed in Mexico.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: While an incredible new discovery is made in the triangle-shaped swamp, Rick Lagina and members of the team make shocking connections in Italy between the Knights Templar and the Oak Island mystery.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, German immigrants Joseph Schlitz and Captain Frederick Pabst find themselves in a battle for beer dominance. Competing, they will help create the most popular alcoholic beverage.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch (S1)
programme.desc: Andy and Paul are in Massachusetts to investigate one of America's oldest sites of High Strangeness and discover that an ancient Native American curse could still be active.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny (S1)
programme.desc: Forget the moon or the stars—every government has even bigger designs in the race to dominate the sky. Uncover a plane crash in North Carolina that almost triggered nuclear Armageddon.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From a Revolutionary War-era ship hiding under Manhattan to a sprawling Roman villa unearthed in the backyard of a home. The structures uncovered in this episode lead to more questions than answers.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: The Brotherhood uncovers a new structure under the swamp and a new theory suggests the Vikings worked with the Templars to help them get to Oak Island.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: As the connection between Nolan's Cross and The Knights Templar deepens the team digs up treasure on Lot Five.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: Two friends and two brothers enter the forge as teams to compete. But after working as teams to recreate a Scottish Broadsword, the victorious team will be divided and forced to face each other.

programme.title: Paikot-ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Gising Na Ang Higanteng Natutulog
programme.desc: Sgt. Delfin Guerrero (Andy Poe), an honest, kind-hearted and dedicated motorcycle cop who took on corrupt politicians in his mission to uphold the law.

programme.title: Mandurugas
programme.desc: Comedians Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs took on the spotlight in this film, which was their first screen team-up. The wacky duo played small-time con-men who, for a quick buck, would do anything or become anything.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: When Andy marries Grace, he is surprised to discover that her family are staying with them. Andy becomes the "house-band" and serves his wife and her family.

programme.title: Bobby Barbers, Parak
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life exploits of Bobby Barbers, Secretary of the Department of Interior and Local Government. It chronicles his life as a young lawyer, a politician and most of all as the celebrated no-nonsense law-enforcer, who became the scourge of wrong-doers all over the country.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends’ lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Takot Ka Ba Dilim?
programme.desc: The young stars of TGIS invaded the big screen in this scary, hilarious adventure where they met the monsters of Philippine folklore. The gang went off to the province for their Holy Week vacation and found themselves face to face with mythological creatures.

programme.title: Buhay Mo'y Buhay Ko Rin
programme.desc: They're both members of the police force: he's an undercover assigned to crack a notorious syndicate, and she's a traffic officer tasked to manage the city's clogged streets.

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Do Re Mi
programme.desc: Donna, Regine and Mikee had one thing in common. They were all dreaming of success as singing stars. Duped by an illegal job recruiter, who promised them a stint in Japan, they decided to strike out on their own by putting up a restaurant where they could also perform.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Hiroshima's A-Bomb Survivor Trees
programme.desc: Trees that survived the A-bomb have inspired many in Hiroshima. 159 such trees are still alive, but some are nearing their end. We follow a tree surgeon and others who love and care for them.

programme.title: NHK Hiroshima Theme Song
programme.desc: NHK Hiroshima's theme song by PORNOGRAFFITTI, marking 80 years since the city was atomic bombed. Full of wishes and prayers for peace, it depicts a streetcar that ran three days after the bombing.

programme.title: AMAMI: Biodiversity
programme.desc: Amami Oshima is a World Natural Heritage Site, with rare flora and fauna including many endemic species. Explore the biodiversity of its lush, subtropical forests in stunning time-lapse footage.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: singer Miyakawa Airi, who's popular for her natural charm; and Atarayo, a three-piece band whose young fans love their emotional lyrics, vocals, and sound.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-19.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at scissors. After arriving in Japan, they evolved in unique ways.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, a kitty leads us to traditional food near a local shrine. Get cool in a maiko's home with another kitty before enjoying sparklers at night.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: The prefecture of Nagasaki, historically Japan's gateway to the west, has a culture influenced by centuries of foreign trade. With over 1,400 islands, it also makes for a unique cycling experience.

programme.title: Story Land in Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 05
programme.desc: Michael unearths a mutant turtle from a mystical Peruvian clay; a woman is blown away when 2 adorable bunnies become 8, and to top it off, a hapless carpenter becomes an accidental time traveler when a potent new glue has him coming undone.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 1
programme.desc: Will Smith plays a young man transplanted from the tough streets of Philadelphia to live with his wealthy Bel-Air relatives, causing everyone to adjust how they live and think.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 2
programme.desc: Ashley's father wants her to continue with her violin lessons, but Will has other ideas.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 3
programme.desc: Will wants to go out with a beautiful girl he meets at the country club, but first he must figure out how to impress her extremely snobbish and very protective father.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 4
programme.desc: When Philip's parents visit from North Carolina, they embarrass him with stories of his poor rural background and his pet pig.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 5
programme.desc: A shady character named "Ice Tray" (guest star Don Cheadle – "Ocean's Thirteen"), one of Will's friends from Philadelphia, comes to Bel-Air for a visit.

programme.title: Smallville S1 12
programme.desc: When Clark rescues his classmate, Eric, from an electrical storm, they’re each struck by lightning -- and Clark’s superpowers are transferred to Eric.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: It feels good to be bad... Assemble a team of the world's most dangerous, incarcerated Super Villains, provide them with the most powerful arsenal at the government's disposal, and send them off on a mission to defeat an enigmatic, insuperable entity. U.S. intelligence officer Amanda Waller has determined only a secretly convened group of disparate, despicable individuals with next to nothing to lose will do.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 16
programme.desc: The President is asked to condemn an anti-gay bill.

programme.title: Friends S5 14
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica's relationship becomes less of a secret. Ross must prove to his boss that he's sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends S5 15
programme.desc: Chandler thinks Monica wants more from their relationship. Ross fails to impress his new neighbors.

programme.title: Friends S5 16
programme.desc: After Phoebe finds a police badge, she uses it to do good deeds. Joey worries that he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends S5 17
programme.desc: Rachel interviews for a great job but she may get it for the wrong reason. Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebe's.

programme.title: Friends S5 18
programme.desc: Rachel starts smoking when she realizes that her boss and co-workers at her new job are smokers. Monica and Phoebe plan a surprise birthday party for Rachel. Joey and Ben audition for a commercial.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 16
programme.desc: The President is asked to condemn an anti-gay bill.

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Lately, it seems Jimmy's only solace can be found at the bottom of a whiskey glass. But when Jimmy's estranged son, Mike (The Killing's Joel Kinnaman), becomes a target, Jimmy must make a choice between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned long ago. With Mike on the run, Jimmy's only penance for his past mistakes may be to keep his son from the same fate Jimmy is certain he'll face himself...at the wrong end of a gun. Now, with nowhere safe to turn, Jimmy just has one night to figure out exactly where his loyalties lie and to see if he can finally make things right.

programme.title: Mad Max
programme.desc: Taking place in a dystopian Australia in the near future, Mad Max tells the story of a highway patrolman cruising the squalid back roads that have become the breeding ground of criminals foraging for gasoline and scraps. When his wife and child meet a grisly end at the hands of a motorcycle gang, Max sets out across the barren wastelands in search of revenge. Written by Cole Matthews

programme.title: Smallville S1 12
programme.desc: When Clark rescues his classmate, Eric, from an electrical storm, they’re each struck by lightning -- and Clark’s superpowers are transferred to Eric.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 18
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard try to advance the cause of women in science by speaking with junior high girls about their future careers, while Raj plans his date with Lucy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 19
programme.desc: When Howard finds a letter from his father, he's forced to confront his past, struggling with whether or not he should open it. And Leonard and Penny throw a grown-up cocktail party at the apartment.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 20
programme.desc: Let the battle begin! Leonard, Sheldon and Raj fight for tenure at the University – and the competition heats up when the girls get involved!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 21
programme.desc: After one of his favorite TV shows gets canceled too soon, Sheldon feels lost, so Amy tries to help him get over his compulsive need for closure.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 22
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon hire Professor Proton (guest star BOB NEWHART), the host of their favorite childhood TV show to perform. Raj leaves his dog with Howard and Bernadette.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 1
programme.desc: Contestants from all walks of life compete for glory and $25,000 cash in an arena unlike any other.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 2
programme.desc: Contestants compete for a shot at $25,000 as they brave the world's most unforgiving battleground.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 5

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 11
programme.desc: At a yard sale, Michael helps a man realize his amazing mind powers and shocks a college student by discovering she's the heir to the entire lot. Later, an art gallery's tribal mask goes missing and has the security guard fearing war!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 12
programme.desc: While doing scientific research, Michael makes things heavy with some otherworldly air. Then, at a bakery, the new rolls are so light, they defy gravity. And as a golf instructor, Michael gets caught by the ultimate sand trap!

programme.title: Container Wars S2 5
programme.desc: Jason's got the inside track on a container that could have him coasting to paradise, but will some rotten contents spoil his score?

programme.title: Inheritors

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: As the sun rises, Sergeant Alice Bontemps is practicing yoga on the lagoon, when she is suddenly confronted with a particularly macabre scene: the lifeless body of a young jet-setter, murdered after a very exclusive beach party.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Jackson asks Alice if she wants to head the investigation, as she was the one to discover the body. But the deeper she delves into this world of image and pretence, the more the truth seems to be masked by appearances.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: La Vie A Velo

programme.title: Stoemp, Peket... Et Des Rawettes

programme.desc: Heading for Brittany, its lighthouses, its carved coastline and its Belgian skippers! Meeting with Djemila Tassin and Jonas Gerckens who make Belgium shine in the offshore race. programme.title: Maestro
